Pantheon:
Suspicious Types... Now recall that recently at the Museum have also seen strange personalities. It seemed to me that they are looking for materials about the Giants... Perhaps one of them gang with those that were seen in the Ruins?
They tried to steal a book called * The War of the Gods and the Giants *. In this ancient manuscript provides information about the strength of the Giants the origin of their powers, monsters era of Giants and the like. I am afraid that now, after the Giants fall of the island, this information may be used misused. necessary Suddenly, a book swap space.
